Reviews.Title: “Super Bowl Stay”
Reviews.Author: franco b
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 10 days bowl ultimately super bowl cant staff comfortable spacious executive suite treat home day stadium staff front desk breakfast crew helpful pleasure deal adam front desk mother theresa breakfast morning plus hotel access highway city plenty food options nearby definitely recommend staff

Reviews.Title: “Another great stay - Clean and comfy!”
Reviews.Author: 3girlsandaguy
Reviews.Content: recently stayed daughters cheerleading competition avoid staying downtown parking perfect location lots food nearby 10 minutes downtown clean nicely decoratedvery modern hotel looks fridge convenient breakfast selection own pancakes waffles cereal yogurt baked muffins bagels etc toast juice fruit hot offerings scrambled changes daily centre lobby pool neat shape kids liked chilly kids didnt mind water hot tub pool clean pool closes 10 pm enforced modern equipment truly enjoyed staying staff courteous complaints bob evans parking lot stay book

Reviews.Title: “A nice hotel”

Reviews.Content: hotel id suggest stay city bit hard near found clean staff friendly nice stayed double fantastic sofa coffee table writing desk microwave mini fridge attached wall bed comfortable suggest hotel light sleeper hear traffic noise im light sleeper slept earplugs
